W E L C O M E

Eromonsele Collins O.

I'm a Mechanical Engineer/Front-End Developer based in Lagos, Nigeria. My specialty lies in combining technical knowledge from engineering with my own creative flair to bring a unique perspective to every design.

I am versed in the use of all common tools and libraries for front end web development, including but not limited to HTML/CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap and React.

I've always been an artist, and I'm quite experienced in the use of common computer based graphical design tools such as Adobe Photoshop and Blender, and even online tools such as those provided by Canva. I'm also an experienced video editor, with knowledge of tools like Premiere Pro and PowerDirector. In cases where physical designs may be necessary, I'm also a versatile pencil and paper artist.

As an avid reader and writer, as well as an engineering graduate, I possess all the skills necessary for both technical and creative writing, enabling me to flesh out any product description, webpage content or blog post.

I have a wealth of experience managing websites on common platforms such as GoDaddy and BlueHost, and working with the back end of websites on control panels like Plesk and cPanel. From Domain Control to SSL Security, I have the skills necessary to keep a website up and running without a hitch

Real Estate Website: Overflowing Grace Integrated Properties. Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript,, jQuery.
